title: Amazon Cognito - Amazon Pinpoint - Amazon SNS
description: Integrate Amazon Pinpoint and Amazon SNS with your Cognito-based application.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern explains how to integrate Lambda functions with Amazon Cognito and dynamically select Sender ID based on country regulations and send SMS message using Amazon SNS SMS.
